DOC.detailed_description: Data linkage pre-antiretroviral therapy ( pre-ART ) care HIV diagnosis home-based HIV counsel test ( HBHCT ) sub-Saharan Africa ( SSA ) scarce . The exist data suggest 13 % 54 % HIV-infected person identify HBHCT enter pre-ART care . No study rigorously evaluate intervention aim improving linkage pre-ART care follow HBHCT SSA . This study evaluate effect follow-up counselling HIV diagnosis HBHCT linkage pre-ART care Masaka , south-western Uganda . The study cluster randomise trial effectiveness referral pre-ART care follow-up counselling ( intervention ) compare referral pre-ART care ( control ) , individual diagnose HIV HBHCT . The intervention administer month 1 2 , linkage care assess month 6 post-HBHCT . Data collect socio-demographic characteristic , sexual risk profile , HIV test history , HIV status disclosure , linkage care , CD4 count test result , cotrimoxazole prophylaxis , ART initiation . At least 224 HIV-infected participant enrol 28 cluster ( 14/study arm ) . Approximately 84 HIV-uninfected individual also recruit study reduce possibility reveal sero-status HIV-infected participant .
